MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW12 postcode area of Congleton, affecting properties in Somerford, Astbury and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulty locating the cause of the fault, and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:06AM on  2nd January 2021
